Participants.description: Unique identifier for each user or participant.
The country where the participant is located (e.g., US, UK, DE).
Count of incomplete mandatory action items or checklists for a participant.
ID representing the organizational unit or company branch.

Plans.description: The name of the equity or retirement plan (e.g., ESPP, RSU Plan 2023).
The date the plan was officially launched.

Grants.description: Unique identifier for a specific award or grant.
The date the grant was awarded to the participant.
The number of shares or units originally granted.

Vesting Schedule.description: The specific date when a tranche of the grant vests.
The number of shares or units that have vested to date.
The number of units scheduled to vest next.

Assets (Legacy).description: The type or category of the asset (e.g., equipment, vehicle, property).
The current operational status of the asset (e.g., active, maintenance, retired).
